Form structure

Use the form structure component as a container to wrap around a collection of form elements.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-form-structure

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-form-structure

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-form-structure/src/scss/form-structure";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Form structure

Use the form__group element to wrap around a group of form elements. The group is separated from other content by a light gray background.

Te weinig tekens

Formaat 000/ 00 00 00

Annuleren

Form structure mobile full width

Add the .form__group--mobile-full-width modifier to adjust the form group to screen width on mobile.

Te weinig tekens

Formaat 000/ 00 00 00

Annuleren
